resources.string: Uncheck IELTS and TOEFL to see more difficult words.
Tap to Choose a Translation Language

Translated by native speakers. Please do not be upset if you do no see your language here. Lack of fund has been the main reason we are not able to add more translations. Please use the pro version of the app if you would like to help us.
Sign in to save your progress
Choose how many words you want to learn per seesion
Choose how many times you want a word to be repeated
Turn off or on sound of the quiz sessions here
Turn on to use real human pronunciation(internet required) or turn off to use text-to-speech engine(no internet required)
Choose image quality that suits best for your device
